Description: Book of the Dead papyrus of Taperet, daughter of Nehemsukhons and Neshorpara.
Curator's comments: Bibliography: Wüthrich, A. and Stöhr, S., Ba-Bringer und Schattenabschneider : Untersuchungen zum so genannten Totenbuchkapitel 191 auf Totenbuchpapyri (Studien zum altägyptischen Totenbuch 18, Wiesbaden, 2012): 12-13, pl. 8.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (57523) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/57523)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus: stained Black ink Red ink Backed: white paper Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Binding: self adhesive tape Object Priority: B Mount Priority: A Overall Condition: B Curatorial condition comment: poor (embalming fluid visible along upper margin)
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Hugh Algernon Percy, 10th Duke of Northumberland (testament)
